com.livelife.motolibrary

Interface OnAntEventListener


  • public interface OnAntEventListener
    The main ANT events listener, implement it in your activity and override the onMessageReceived(byte[] message) and onAntServiceConnected() methods to get ANT events in your code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAntServiceConnected()
      Called when the MotoConnection is ready to send and receive messages.
      void onMessageReceived(byte[] message, long time)
      Called when an ANT message is received from a tile.
      void onNumbersOfTilesConnected(int connected)
      Called when the number of tiles connected changes

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageReceived

        Called when an ANT message is received from a tile.
        Parameters:

        Called when the MotoConnection is ready to send and receive messages.

        Called when the number of tiles connected changes
        Parameters:
        connected - the number of tiles connected.
